definitions.definition: A female partner in an unmarried romantic relationship .
examples: Marc went to the park with his girlfriend and watched the sunset with her.
I was playing the acoustic guitar and my girlfriend was playing the drums.

definitions.definition: A female friend of a woman or girl.
examples: Mary always enjoyed hanging out with her girlfriend Jessica.

definitions.definition: A fellow gay man, especially a friend as opposed to a sexual partner.
A term of address for a female friend or among gay men.

main_definition: A female partner in an unmarried romantic relationship .
secondary_definitions: ( somewhat dated ) A female friend of a woman or girl.
( LGBTQ ) A fellow gay man, especially a friend as opposed to a sexual partner.
A term of address for a female friend or among gay men.
